name: volume-components-to-frames
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
CONVERT RGB/COMPLEX VOLUME TO FRAMES.

RGB and complex datatypes are not always well supported, this command allows separating them into standard subvolumes for better support.

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: the input volume converted to multiple frames of scalar type

output-files.name: output
output-files.description: the input volume converted to multiple frames of scalar type
